0ad7ccaf4ffc2f35.voiceContent: Huh? You don't believe it? Just ask my classmates, almost everyone will tell you the same

1309fbf17a0b1583.voiceContent: I'm under a lot of pressure, and it really stresses me out... I don't know if I'm studying hard enough, or how my future will turn out..

1a655d11f8cdf551.voiceContent: Okay, so get this There's this creepy laboratory in our institute where strange things happen

1a7cc3d82171505a.voiceContent: Ugh, whyyy... I still wasn't able to fall asleep yet... Can't I just try a little longer? *groan

332fb96e65c259e3.voiceContent: No, not those... Oh, c'mon, I'm not an entomology major and even I know that Fireflies aren't anything like what I'm talking about

455d99b893554d32.voiceContent: Things I want to do? Let's see, where to start..

4950f5a87f819522.voiceContent: Hehe, well, at least I was smart enough to figure that out..

4a79d9ba2a01d2f4.voiceContent: And I'm always scared that I'll miss something important... Ugh, I'll never be able to forgive myself if that happens

50e837ca03bae2f2.voiceContent: It's Aaru Village, isn't it? Reminds me of the first time I was out around those parts doing some fieldwork

55ffc46463f72dc9.voiceContent: This place feels kinda... yeah, a lot like where I live. Cozy and familiar

5b56276838800702.voiceContent: Ugh, no no no... I gotta stop worrying so much about everything! The whole point of me taking a vacation was to come here and relax

6778f853544b134f.voiceContent: At first, I was worried I wouldn't be able to get to sleep without my normal bed, or that I... Well, anyway, turns out I was worrying for nothing

6a90b3d22fb45639.voiceContent: Perfect! Let's go relax and just let the day pass by

6df8f102c24b4cb7.voiceContent: But then, when they opened the door to check, the room was completely dark and there was nobody inside

6fd80a7312a7c777.voiceContent: I used to always lose sleep because of those pests, but thankfully there's nothing like that here

7480e1e04fd5625d.voiceContent: Mm, morning... Wait, morning!? How is it light out already..

75b3449f60b6af30.voiceContent: Tonight I'm going to focus again on clearing my mind... No schoolwork, no assignments, nothing! Keeping it completely blank..

772377bf8988f415.voiceContent: Hmm... I can think of a dozen things just off the top of my head. Take a really nice nap, walk all around this beautiful place..

78168bd133dbf38f.voiceContent: Oh! Uh, I mean, you're so nice and all, and everything here just makes me feel so comfortable..

7cc9b0c500e683f3.voiceContent: And even the ones who don't believe it still go out of their way to avoid that place

82ae15d0f9ee89d5.voiceContent: Little white houses, plants exclusive to the desert climate... Hmm... Okay, I think I've got it

88e392b7932d05a4.voiceContent: Weird stuff like this happens a couple of times a week. And it's bad luck for the one who hears it It means you'll flunk your next exam

98a8031a3c2dd7d0.voiceContent: Hehe, so there are *some* things you don't know then

9a861c8a8c889e90.voiceContent: They may be tiny, but when they go buzzing right by your ear in the dead of the night... BZZT! Ugh, it's so annoying

a3c213b0ae427945.voiceContent: It's exhausting, but I guess you already saw that... Which is probably why you suggested I take a vacation a—and get some proper rest, right

a89c6a5190d91863.voiceContent: Usually, I'm pretty picky about whether the place has any pesky bugs flying around..

aa2450e1436179a3.voiceContent: The Sighing Spirit of the Laboratory... ever heard of it

b5c745706740eb25.voiceContent: How many reports do I still have left to write...? Four... Oh, no, five..

b8cebde94b778b48.voiceContent: ...As you can see, I lack confidence no matter what I do, there's always something worrying me

ba2ec9faf6274eba.voiceContent: Whether it's studying, or even just life in general... There are so many things I have yet to get the hang of

d641a9c1c36be13b.voiceContent: When there's time, I'll have to tell you all about what happened on that trip. There are quite a few interesting bits

e56d59da70310fb8.voiceContent: Whew, alright, it's decided... my mind needs a rest. So I'm not going to do anything, or worry about anything at all

e5bb965b97aae866.voiceContent: Definitely the kind of place where you can have a proper rest and really relax

e98abc69a8a2754c.voiceContent: Oh, don't worry, I've got everything I need here, no complaints at all

eab4a87b5324736e.voiceContent: It's tidy and peaceful here. Practically an oasis for insomniacs like me

ec3b8f0b05ab21ae.voiceContent: Several people say that when they've walked by that lab at night, they heard the sound of someone sighing inside

f1ca3dc7c9d85484.voiceContent: But if you mean what I want to do most, right here and now, then... I guess it'd be to simply do nothing

f646b28572d4ce97.voiceContent: #Goodnight, {NICKNAME}! This is it... the most critical time of the day

f65929d9773bc8a6.voiceContent: I didn't mean there's anything wrong with this place. That's not what I'm trying to say at all

f75667a177c1176b.voiceContent: ...And to realize that I should really take you up on your offer, and make sure I get a good rest for once

fad69e972039f5b1.voiceContent: Please, oh please just let me get some sleep tonight... I need it sooo bad

fb03b85898f5fb1a.voiceContent: You know, the kind that keep buzzing around the room and distracting you

fb427ecd447439ea.voiceContent: Nobody wants to risk failing their exams, you know

fc8b9ee84b7e5d5a.voiceContent: Hmm, lemme think about what would be interesting for you... Ah, I know

36ffb0a99c497f17.voiceContent: (Hmm... I think it's slowly starting to come together now...

4998a9854e3f79ee.voiceContent: (This is a good spot for a fire. Even if the fire was to spread, it'd be easy to contain.

71e289eeeb4736cb.voiceContent: (I've been getting hungry thinking about food all this time...

020f7dc39e24a95f.voiceContent: Since I found something I like and that I'm good at, I think I should try and stick with it. Even if the journey is difficult, even if the competition is fierce, even if there's no guarantee I'll graduate, and even if I have to return all my scholarships if I fail my final exams... Huh, maybe I should just drop out and go back home

04b35d3df9f1327c.voiceContent: ...Huh, I saw someone who matches that description when I woke up after sleepwalking for the first time. Candace, huh? Now I know. I still remember the moment I woke up... All of my reports and essays were done. At the time, it felt like... like after pleading to the stars for days and days, now they'd finally heard me, and sent a messenger to help me... I felt so touched

0513e1400cc49828.voiceContent: Has Professor Faruzan managed to get any students? People from the Haravatat Darshan say that she always has difficulty getting funding for her projects, so it's hard for her to attract students, too. *sigh*..

0a8e5b96d742ea6e.voiceContent: Scorching hot days and freezing cold nights... I—I don't think I'm gonna make it..

0f441be8bd135a58.voiceContent: I'm not naturally talented, nor am I a fast learner... I only got into the Akademiya by studying like crazy for the entrance exam... Oh shoot, I—I'm sorry, I can't chat right now. Mentioning the Akademiya reminds me that my academic progress report is due soon... and I still haven't got any progress to write about yet

13de5a170e0da180.voiceContent: Are there any plants that can catch bugs, because if so, I need their help. I don't fall asleep easily to begin with, but now there's this little flying bug somewhere in my room... The buzzing is so loud, and it never stops... but I—I've tried, but I just can't find it... *groan

1ad29060eae03c86.voiceContent: Um... maybe we should just grab some takeout

1b02bd3bea8e8edc.voiceContent: Mm, this sun's making me so... *yawn* sleepy... Mkay, lemme grab a pillow and rest my eyes before this wears off... It's been two, two days since I last, last... Zzz..

1f931bc602e4c714.voiceContent: I've heard people say she thinks a blessing from the stars is the reason why all of her outstanding schoolwork gets magically finished while she's asleep. Ah, she has absolutely no idea. ...Oh, but seriously, don't tell her, okay

217978d028ad7ebd.voiceContent: Oh no... How did this happen..

242347d7b04a5b76.voiceContent: Almost all of Sumeru's best and brightest have attended the Akademiya, and there are a ton of scarily intelligent international students, too... so you can imagine how competitive it is here! Studying alongside some of these people, sometimes it makes me wonder... am I really cut out for this

2a6a65eca181d7e7.voiceContent: My legs are so sore... *sigh* Guess I must have been sleepwalking last night... again

2e6d22bed4b5b29d.voiceContent: The snow is sparkling. Just like the stars in the night sky

327958855e2dd562.voiceContent: I bet someone who's good enough to get a job like Scribe never has to worry about whether their projects will get approved or be successful. Wait... Oh shoot, if he's a Scribe, he probably doesn't have to do any projects in the first place. So lucky..

339bcb4406a01bf5.voiceContent: Every night before I go to bed, I make myself a glass of warm milk, in the hope I'll sleep well tonight, hope I'll sleep well tonight, hope I'll sleep well tonight... Zzz..

3a0a710bbc8ac0f8.voiceContent: Did you get enough sleep? If you're still tired, you should go back to sleep for a bit... Me? *sigh* I'm... used to it..

3a33ae044a1f2812.voiceContent: A little goes a long way

3d79cc7521929db1.voiceContent: I slept okay-ish before I came to the Akademiya, but since I started my studies... there's so much pressure... I just want to be able to sleep the whole night throo-hoo-hoough..

3ec3d215f784aee4.voiceContent: Wow! Suddenly, I don't feel so tired

4336276940a87222.voiceContent: If I don't end up staying at the Akademiya after graduation, I think I'll come travel the world with you. What do you think

4886224aac8b462b.voiceContent: Get it together, Layla... You've gotta work harder

4b7c407298323f96.voiceContent: Get it together, Layla! Believe in yourself, and in the person who's helped you come this far. The two of you together can solve any problem that comes your way!Whew... Alright! Time to leave my worries behind. Let's go

4d670100d860efae.voiceContent: I applied for vacation... You remembered too, right

5d2435ba45a73270.voiceContent: This is amazing! I'm so jealous, you're good at everything

6246ef05bde551c2.voiceContent: I'm going to turn in early tonight, hope I can actually get to sleep... Dear Mighty God of Wisdom, please bless my slumber, I pray. Okay. Closing my eyes now

6ed8bcd8452db1c2.voiceContent: *yawn* ...Right, let's see what's stumped Daylight Layla this time. Hmm... she hasn't touched the third year of old Starlogs yet, they definitely need working through. And there's a few charts to be appended to the mid-term report, which... yep, she hasn't even started drawing up yet. Alright, time to get to work. ...Huh? What're you doing up? You should be asleep right now. Me? Sleepwalking, of course

71da1b6bfdca49dc.voiceContent: Drawing Star Charts is really tiring work... I really don't think I'd be able to keep at it if it wasn't something I'm interested in. You have to use a ruler, then do some calculations on paper, then check past Starlogs... Before you know it, the whole day is gone. But then when I look at the finished product, a huge, neatly drawn, accurate map of the stars... it always gives me a huge sense of accomplishment

73fea2966ca0c16e.voiceContent: The General Mahamatra is really good at Genius Invokation TCG? Ooh, I wonder if... I mean, if I ever got the chance, maybe I could play a game with him. Card games like Genius Invokation TCG are always easier when you're good at mental math, so actually, I... I dunno, but... I might not necessarily lose to him

74a0fabaeaf17448.voiceContent: This is amazing! I'm so jealous, you're good at everything

782cced5d41f118c.voiceContent: Mona Megistus, the Astrologist... Her astrology column in The Steambird is well-known among Rtawahist scholars. Her articles always cover super specialized topics, but can still be appreciated by non-academics. That's no easy feat... Huh? Her name seems to just roll off my tongue? Uh, that's just because... I have a lot of respect for... amazing people

79ce29ce317800df.voiceContent: My relationship with my adviser? Um... how should I put it... Oh, don't get me wrong, she's been good to me. She even gave me a recommendation when I started at the school. And every time I feel like I just can't go on, she's there to give me s—some much-needed encouragement... and then to assign me another essay right after..

7b5419c88eaf922e.voiceContent: Um... maybe we should just grab some takeout

7b90cf07cb83c351.voiceContent: Can't sleep? Let's go for a walk then

7c9ac3f3a96f93de.voiceContent: *groan* ...Why do I have to write so many papers, whyyy..

812af80556d53480.voiceContent: Even when we're not looking up at the stars, they're always there, watching over us

828dda51161bec4c.voiceContent: Okay... I think I got this..

8fb0d3890a98a5e3.voiceContent: Happy birthday. I got you this pocket astrolabe... The same stars witness the fate of the human race today as did yesterday, and as will forever. May they cast their gaze upon you, and may they stay with you always, through the desert and across the ocean, until you reach your destination

92d802aefff441c5.voiceContent: This is just a... bad dream..

9406d640066f721a.voiceContent: No, no, no! Oh, this is bad..

95cb003ddbd6da81.voiceContent: Someone once told me about a mysterious merchant who was selling really effective Sleep Gummies. It cost all my scholarship money, plus all the other Mora I'd saved up, but I bought some. They worked great, and for a while I slept like a baby. But... they're 200 thousand Mora a box... I can't afford that... I—I can't let myself buy them ever again, nope, no way. Not even if they were buy one, get one free, or... well, buy one, get two free, hmm... actually... maybe I'd consider that

99b30a735ecc89b4.voiceContent: I'm in the middle of a stellar kinematics calculation right now, just go to lunch without me... Wait, th—this angle isn't right... No, no, no... Shoot, how far in was I when this mistake crept in..

9ad44030ae2d44aa.voiceContent: Oh, the weather's terrible. Shoot, if I can't see the sky tonight... Ugh, I really can't put off my star mapping homework any longer..

9bb971e92a9bb956.voiceContent: Wake up! You look half asleep

9e64131fee0ee149.voiceContent: *yawn*... Where's that glowing coming from? I coulda sworn I turned the lights off before I fell asleep... Huh, it's just my Vision. No wonder... Wait, but... didn't I leave this on my nightstand

9f10946361b0ddb4.voiceContent: Get it together, Layla... You're doing well so far, but you've still got a lot to learn

aeef801226ec0a9a.voiceContent: The chief editor of our Darshan keeps Starlogs that show the fates of all living beings. They are, without a shadow of a doubt, the apex of astronomical knowledge. The first time I saw one, I was scared speechless! Huh? Are you interested? If you just want to take a quick look... lemme put in an application for you, I think it should be fine... I think...

b5fb5ed909f433ec.voiceContent: Um, is it too late for a do-over

c0b70c0db4522575.voiceContent: Huh, glad I saw this. I almost didn't even notice it

c599ba0f81ae4edb.voiceContent: I agree. I don't like having to pull an all-nighter to catch up on schoolwork either, but they just keep piling on the assignments, don't they? That's how things go here, so obviously I have to help her out... Wanna keep me company

cd98d5befb24c3e5.voiceContent: Shh, be quiet... Don't wake her up, just let her sleep peacefully. ...Who's her? Ah, well, a very weary Layla who's constantly stressed about her schoolwork, of course. ...And me? Hehe, I'm Layla too

cf2462f895011ab7.voiceContent: *sigh* My mind is completely blank... I need to get out and unwind

d5e1a0ea795b4275.voiceContent: According to my textbook, Using theoretical astrology to solve specific problems in our daily lives should not be our primary goal. But whether we should or not, the real reason nobody does it is that... well, it's just... it's not worth the effort. When we do a prediction, we usually have to use multiple celestial globes and consult at least one whole year's worth of Star Charts to get any... precise answers. To go through all that just to find out whether the price of spices will go up tomorrow... I mean, it's just not worth it..

d8a8a3bbc6cb2ef6.voiceContent: *yawn* ...Hi, I'm Layla, a Rtawahist student... Hmm? Sorry, I didn't sleep well last night, so I'm a bit out of it today — what did you say, again? ...You wanna team up with me? No, no, it's not that I don't want to, I'm just not sure my crazy sleep schedule will really work for you... But uh, I guess... I look forward to working with you

ee5c92626bc387d9.voiceContent: Is it too late for an extension

f858ce59e5f18405.voiceContent: Get it together, Layla... You've been studying hard and reading everything you could get your hands on. Well done. But you can't afford to slack off now. The moment you get lazy, you'll fall behind and end up having to postpone your graduation. Spare yourself the humiliation

fa8dfbd769c45a0d.voiceContent: Oh... D—Dori... ahem... I took the plunge and bought something from her once. She looked euphoric as I was settling the bill — I think she assumed I was some sort of mega-rich person. Kept relentlessly sending product ads to me in the mail afterwards. Ugh... biggest mistake of my life! I paid such a huge price for it... 'cause not only did I spend all of my scholarship money in one go, but for most of the next year, I had to survive mainly on cheap vegetables, and I couldn't buy textbooks unless they were on sale..

fad4c5abcad64ade.voiceContent: Oh, I know who you're talking about. Lisa Minci — the legendary Spantamad prodigy who graduated in just two years. If only I had her brains... Huh? You met her in person when you were in Mondstadt? R—Really? So... what's her studying process like? What books does she read, and what kind of work does she do? Where... Where should I start if I want to learn from her

fe57008e5d7951a8.voiceContent: Dear Mighty God of Wisdom, I've been studying late into the night for days on end, please let me pass this exam! Please, please... Zzz..
